mil3.2.7:1.3: “Alam, maharaja, kim te tena pucchitena, nanu maya patikacceva akkhatam ‘sace, maharaja, saupadano bhavissami, patisandahissami, sace anupadano bhavissami, na patisandahissami’”ti.
mil3.2.7:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso ranno adhikaram kareyya.
mil3.2.7:2.3: Raja tuttho adhikaram dadeyya, so tena adhikarena pancahi kamagunehi samappito samangibhuto paricareyya, so ce janassa aroceyya ‘na me raja kinci patikaroti’ti.
mil3.2.7:2.4: Kim nu kho so, maharaja, puriso yuttakari bhaveyya”ti?
mil3.2.7:2.6: “Evameva kho, maharaja, kim te tena pucchitena, nanu maya patikacceva akkhatam ‘sace saupadano bhavissami, patisandahissami, sace anupadano bhavissami, na patisandahissami’”ti.
